Hugo, ha tenido efectos positivos al utilizar créditos como un inventario más diversificado, más clientes satisfechos y mejores ingresos; en esta ocasión necesita invertir en la compra de detergentes para pisos, autos, baños, etc., para ofrecer a los clientes.
Su condición familiar sigue mejorando día con día gracias a su esfuerzo, su familia se mantiene con los mismos miembros, las condiciones de vida han mejorado para todos.
texts.en:
Hugo has had positive effects from using loans: his inventory is more diverse, he has more satisfied customers and his income has risen.  On this occasion, he needs to buy detergents for floors, autos, bathrooms, etc. to offer customers.  

His family situation continues to improve day to day thanks to his effort and his family size is unchanged;  living conditions have improved for all of them.

loans.use: to buy detergents for floors, autos, bathrooms, etc.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en:
Felicitas is a farmer from the town of San Miguel, Bohol. She is a married woman and has been in the farming business for more than 20 years now. This is the source of her income. 

Felicitas is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. With this, she will be able to improve the productivity of her farm thus increasing her yield and profit. In the future, Felicitas hopes of making her farming business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm.

loans.name: Heydi Yanelia

texts.es:
La Joven Heydi, tiene 22 años de edad, tiene 1 hijo, vive con su esposo en su casa de habitación, se dedica a la venta de ropa, productos lácteos y golosinas cuenta con más de 1 años de dedicarse  a este tipo de actividad.
Heydi tiene una buena clientela ya que su negocio está ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico de alto comercio, el préstamo lo solicita para compra de churros, galletas, refrescos, aguas, queso, leche, etc. espera que le ayude a tener un mejor surtido en su negocio lo que le permita mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares y compromisos financieros.
Heydi su sueños es ampliar su negocio permitiéndole tener mayor clientela y mejorar sus ingresos  para darle una mejor educación a su hijo  y mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y su familia, con el apoyo que reciba del préstamo espera le permita lograr sus sueños,


  Trojes, Honduras - Septiembre 2013
texts.en:
Heydi is 22 years old and has 1 son. She lives with her husband in their house. She works selling clothes, dairy products and snacks. She has more than 1 year of experience doing this type of activity. 

Heydi has a good clientele because her business is located in a very strategic place where there is a lot of commerce. The loan she is asking for is to buy churros, cookies, bottled water, cheese, milk, etc. She hopes that it will help her to have a better stocked business which will allow her to improve her income to cover her family expenses and financial commitments. 

Heydi dream is to expand her business, allowing her to have more customers and improve her income to give her son a better education and improve her and her family's quality of life. She hopes that the help she is getting from the loan will help her achieve her dreams.  


Trojes, Honduras - September, 2013

loans.use: to buy churros, cookies, beverages, bottled water, cheese, milk, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong, 49, is married and has three children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns an income as a bus driver. Phuong started a general store nine years ago. 

She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of beverages and household items to sell at her store so that she can better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business will run smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To expand her business by buying a greater variety of beverages and household items to sell

loans.name: Sang

texts.en:
Sang is requesting a new loan to buy a greater range and quantity of food products and beverages to stock his store. 

His previous loan enabled him to expand his business and earn a higher income to support his family. He hopes that another loan will assist him in increasing the size of his business, attracting new customers and increasing his sales. 

He also hopes that, through the loan, he can increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater range and quantity of food products and beverages to stock his store

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. 

Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy food and beverages to restock her store.

loans.name: Berta Lidia

texts.es:
Doña Berta Lidia tiene 48 años de edad, está acompañada y es ama de casa, caficultora y comerciante la cual en compañía de su conyugue tiene 4 hijos y solo uno depende de ella ya que los demás están en hogares a parte y son personas independientes. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria no completado el cual curso hasta el 3 grado de primaria por lo que la situación financiera de sus padres en esa época era muy poca. Ella se dedica a la caficultura hace más de 12 años lo cual aprendió gracias a su familia y hoy junto a su compañero de hogar sigue practicando y los terrenos que juntos cultivan son herencia de sus padres los cuales están ubicados atrás de su casa de habitación.
Ella ha solicitado un apoyo financiero a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que ayuden a mantener sus cultivos de café protegidos de la roya y de la broca entre otros bichos y enfermedades que deterioran la cosecha para poder obtener de una buena temporada un buen y atractivo grano.
Sus planes en un futuro es poder cultivar una mejor variedad de café con la cual pueda ofrecer y competir en el mercado para poder salir adelante y algún día poder sacarlo del país como un producto de calidad. Su sueño para su negocio y su familia es obtener una mayor producción como lo dijo anteriormente y poder completar la educación de su hijo hasta llegarla a un máximo grado como ser la universidad.
texts.en:
Berta Lidia, 48, has a spouse and is a housewife, coffee grower and merchant.  She and her spouse have four children but only one of them is still dependent on her since the rest all have homes of their own and are independent people.  She did not complete primary school; she only finished 3rd grade because her parents’ financial situation back then was very limited.  She’s been growing coffee for more than 12 years having learned to do so from her family.  Today, in the company of her spouse she continues doing so on land  located behind their house they cultivate together and that they inherited from her parents.

She has asked Comixmul cooperative for financial assistance to be able to buy agricultural supplies to help her care for her coffee plants to protect them from the La Roya and La Broca fungi among other pests and illnesses that deteriorate the crop so that they can get good crop yields of attractive, good coffee beans.

Her future plan is to be able to grow a better quality coffee that she can sell in the market and be competitive with to get ahead and someday export it as a quality product.  Her dream for her business and for her family is to get larger crop yields as stated previously and to complete her son’s schooling so he can go all the way up to university level.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Mazharkhon

texts.ru: Мазхархон трудолюбивый человек. Он родился в 1967 года. Мазхархон женат и воспитывает замечательных детей. Он занимается предоставлением услуги сварщика. Мазхархон заботливый отец и всегда старается обеспечить свою семью со всеми необходимыми средствами. Его дочь учится в Медицинском Университете на 2 курсе. Мазхархон должен оплатить за учебу своей дочери в университете и с такой целью он обратился за займом. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1100 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Mazharkhon is a hardworking man. He was born in 1967. Mazharkhon is married and is raising wonderful children. He provides welding services. Mazharkhon is a caring father and always strives to provide his family with all the necessities. His daughter is studying in the Medical Univeristy in the 2nd course. 

Mazharkhon must pay his daughter's university tuition and with this aim applied for a loan. He is requesting a loan of US$1,100 to pay tuition.

loans.use: to pay tuition for his daughter

loans.name: Jose Cruz

texts.es: José de 39 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus 5 hijos.  José es un hombre muy trabajador que con mucho esfuerzo va sacado adelante a su familia. Él se gana la vida mediante la comercialización  de pescado lo cual es su principal fuente de ingresos. Además, se dedica a la agricultura principalmente  a la siembra de maíz. Su principal patrimonio es su casa que con mucho esfuerzo ha construido, desea hacerle algunos arreglos ya que con  el tiempo el techo se ha deteriorado y el agua de las lluvias se filtra dañando sus pocas pertenencias e incomodando a su familia. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios (lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos) para realizar el cambio de la cubierta de techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
José, 39, lives with his wife and five children in a house he owns.  José’s a very hardworking man who is moving his family forward with much effort.  He earns his living selling fish; this is his main source of income.  He also works in agriculture mainly growing corn.  

His main asset is the house he’s built with so much effort and he wants to do some improvements to it because the roof has deteriorated over time and rain water leaks in damaging the few possessions he has and creating discomfort for his family.

He’s asking FUSAI for this loan to buy building supplies (galvanized metal sheets, lumber and nails) needed to replace the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Marta Elena

texts.es: Marta de 38 años de edad, vive junto a esposo y cuatro hijos. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y responsable. Con mucho esfuerzo y gracias a  la ayuda de su esposo quien es agricultor, han logrado hacerse de un molino de nixtamal en donde muchas personas buscan su servicio para moler diferentes semillas (maíz, arroz, frijoles, café, etc.). De esta forma se gana la vida y colabora con la economía de su hogar. Cuenta con una casa muy humilde que es su principal patrimonio y futura herencia para sus hijos.  Lastimosamente el terreno donde tiene su casa está en malas condiciones ya que las lluvias lo están lavando y necesita urgentemente un muro de contención. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y ladrillo para la construcción del muro y de esta forma espera dar mayor seguridad a su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Marta, 38, lives with her husband and four children.  She’s noted for being an enterprising, hardworking, responsible woman.  With much effort and thanks to her husband’s help who is a farmer, she’s managed to acquire a corn mill that many people come by to use to grind various seeds (corn, rice, beans, coffee, etc.).  She earns a living this way and contributes to household support.

She owns a very humble house that’s her main asset and her children’s future inheritance.  Sadly, the land the house is on is in bad shape because the rains are washing it away.  She urgently needs a retaining wall which is why she’s asked FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, sand and bricks to build it and provide greater security for her family.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Hermenia

texts.en:
Hermenia is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Hermenia is 52 years old and one of her children is still in school.

Hermenia has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a  19,500 PHP (Philippine pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional equipment and gear for fishing.

She has been in this business for nine years and would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional equipment and gear for fishing

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: María de 28 años de edad reside junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 7 años y 4 años de edad. María es una mujer emprendedora y responsable quien se dedica a la venta de productos típicos, pescados y productos por catálogo. Trabaja mucho ya que para ella lo más importante es que su familia cuente con buenas condiciones. María posee una casa que junto a su esposo han construido pero que con el tiempo el techo se ha deteriorado y es necesario hacer el cambio lo antes posible ya que cuando llueve se filtra el agua. María ha solicitado crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra  de lámina galvanizada y madera. Tiene plena confianza que con lo que gana en  sus pequeños negocios logrará cubrir la deuda.
texts.en:
María, 28, lives with her life companion and their two children who are 7 and 4 years of age.  María’s an enterprising, responsible woman who works selling traditional products, fish and catalog-based products.  She works much because for her it’s of utmost importance that her family be in good condition.

María owns a house that she and her husband have built but in time the roof has worn down and it needs to be replaced as soon as possible because it leaks when it rains.  María has asked FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheets and lumber.  She’s fully confident that she’ll be able to repay the loan with what she earns from her small businesses.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair her roof.

loans.name: Maria Reina

texts.es: María tiene 59 años de edad, y habita junto a su esposo, dos hijos y dos nietos. Ella se dedica a la venta de gallinas, limones y además, le ayuda  a su esposo en la agricultura. Se caracteriza por ser una mujer visionaria, emprendedora y responsable. Reside en casa propia la cual desea hacerle algunas mejoras con el fin de darle mayor estabilidad y seguridad a su familia. Ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar pintura, cemento y arena para pintar las paredes y encementar el piso de  su vivienda.
texts.en:
María, 59, lives with her husband, two children and two grandchildren.  She works selling chickens, lemons and others.  Her husband helps her working in agriculture.  She’s noted for being a forward-looking, enterprising, responsible woman.

She lives in a house of her own that needs some improvements in order to provide more stability and security for her family.  She’s asked FUSAI for a loan to buy paint, cement and sand to paint the walls and lay a cement floor in the house.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to do home improvements.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica tiene  51 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y su hijo. Ella se dedica  a la venta de pescado dentro de su comunidad y es muy reconocida por ser una mejer responsable y emprendedora. Su esposo es agricultor y le ayuda en la economía del hogar. Su casa es muy humilde pero propia y desde hace algunos meses está buscando la oportunidad de hacer la reparación del techo que está muy dañado y cuando llueve se filtra el agua. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera. Espera contar con este apoyo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Angélica, 51, lives with her husband and son in a house she owns.  She’s works selling fish in her community and is very well-known for being a responsible, enterprising woman.  Her husband’s a farmer and helps her with family expenses.

Her house though humble is hers and for some months now she’s been seeking a way to repair the roof that’s quite damaged and leaks when it rains.  This is why she’s asked FUSAI for this loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, nails and lumber.  She hopes to be able to rely on this support as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair her roof.

loans.name: Bitochi

texts.ru: Биточи 62 года. Она проживает в городе Худжанд с сыном, невесткой и тремя внуками. Биточи имеет высшее финансовое образование и работает в одной фирме бухгалтером. Ее внук Анвар учится в Худжадском Государственном Университете по специальности информатика. Он увлекается компьютерными программами и в будущем хочет стать IT специалистом. Бабушка видит старания внука и хочет помочь ему оплатить за годовой контракт, так как его родители сейчас не в финансовом состоянии, чтобы произвести оплату. Для реализации задуманного Биточи обратилась за кредитом. Биточи верит в Анвара и очень хочет, чтобы он успешно окончил университет. Она просит у Вас поддержки и обещает выплачивать кредит в срок за счет своей работы.
texts.en:
Bitochi is 62 years old and lives in the town of Khujand with her son, daughter-in-law and three grandsons. Bitochi has a higher education in finance and works in an accounting firm. 

Her grandson, Anvar, studies information technology at Khujand State University. He likes computer programming and wants to become an IT professional. His grandmother sees how hard he works. She wants to help him pay his yearly tuition; his parents are not in a financial position to be able to pay the fees themselves. In order to do this, Bitochi has asked for a loan. She believes in Anvar and truly wants him to succeed in graduating from the university. She asks for your support and promises to repay the loan through her own work.

loans.use: to pay for her grandson's tuition fees.

loans.name: María Bernarda

texts.es: María tiene 38 años de edad y es madre soltera de tres hijos dos de los cuales trabajan y le colaboran con la economía de su hogar. Ella tiene ocho años de dedicarse a la venta de tamales dentro de su comunidad. Es muy conocida  y muchas personas dan buenas referencias de ella. Su principal patrimonio en su humilde casa la cual tiene deteriorado el techo y desea reparar lo antes posible. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera de tal forma que le permita hacer la reparación lo antes posible.
texts.en: María is 38 years old. She is a single mother of three children, two of whom work and contribute to the household economy. She has been working selling tamales within her community for eight years. She is very well known and many people give her good references. Her main asset is her humble home, but the roof is deteriorated and she wants to repair it as soon as possible. That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI, to invest in purchasing galvanized sheet metal and wood so that she can make the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal and wood to repair her roof.

loans.name: Sindor

texts.ru: Синдор родился 1995 года. В 2002 году поступил в школу и в 2013 году успешно окончил. В 2013 году он поступил в Худжандский Государственный Университет факультет Металлургия и Климатология. Данное время он является студентом 1 курса. Он очень способный молодой человек. Синдор увлекается спортом и в свободное время читает классическую литературу. Его родители простые рабочие и не в состоянии оплатить за его учебу в этом году. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту. Этот займ поможем молодому студенту окончить университет и реализовать свои знания в будущем.
texts.en:
Sindor was born in 1995. In 2002, he enrolled in school and in 2013 successfully graduated. В 2013, he enrolled in the Khujand State University Department of Metallurgy and Climatology. Currently, he is a first year student. 

He is a very capable young man. Sindor is interested in sports and in his spare time reads classical literature. His parents are simple laborers and are unable to pay for his tuition this year. 

He is requesting a loan to pay university tuition. This loan will help the young student to graduate from university and to implement his knowledge in the future.

loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy timber

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия родилась в 1980 года. Она опытная портниха и создает шедевры таджикских национальных платьев. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет одну дочь. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами  8 лет назад она начала свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Она постепенно развевает свой бизнес. Она имеет одну ученицу. Зулфия является основной кормилицей семьи, так как ее муж не имеет постоянное место работы. Он мастер по разработки деревянных изделий. Он хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию и найти там работу. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки авиабилета для мужа. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Zulfiya was born in 1980. She is an experienced dressmaker and creates beautiful Tadjik national dresses. She is married with one daughter. To support her family, she started her own business sewing women's clothing eight years ago. She is gradually growing her business, and has one apprentice. 

Zulfiya is the main breadwinner for the family because her husband does not have a steady job. He is skilled in making wooden items, and wants to go to the Russian Federation to find work there. Zulfiya has requested a loan of 1,500 TJS to buy him an airplane ticket. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your mercy.

loans.use: To buy an airplane ticket for her husband to travel to Russia.

loans.name: Gulhayo

texts.ru: Гулхаё трудолюбивая и целеустремленная девушка. Она родилась в 1994 года. Она является студенткой 2 курса. Гулхаё учится по специальности Таджикская филология. Она учится упорно для того, чтобы получить хорошее образование и в будущем стать высококвалифицированным специалистом. Гулхаё живет вместе с родителями и помогает им по выращиванию сельхоз культур. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Gulhayo is a hardworking and purposeful young woman. She was born in 1994. She is a second year student. Gulhayo is majoring in Tajik philology. She studies hard in order to receive a good education and in the future to become a highly qualified specialist. 

Gulhayo lives with her parents and helps them to grow crops. 

She is requesting a loan to pay tuition.

loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Maria Ester

texts.es: María de 51 años de edad es madre soltera y  reside junto a su hija y dos nietos en casa humilde pero propia desde hace mucho tiempo. Ella se dedica a la venta de hoja de huerta (hoja usada para la preparación de tamales: comida típica), en la plaza principal de su municipio. Tiene 15 años de dedicarse al negocio y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar.  En la actualidad, María no cuenta con el servicio de agua potable por lo cual tiene que pagar más por adquirirla o acarrear desde muy temprano del día de una fuente pública de la comunidad. María se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar este crédito que le permita invertir en la introducción del vital líquido que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en:
María, 51, is a single mother who has been living for a long time with her daughter and two grandchildren in a house that’s humble but hers.  She works selling leaves that are used to wrap tamales, a traditional food, in the town main square.  She’s been in this business 15 years and this is how she supports her home.

María lacks potable water service so she must pay more to get it or carry it very early from the community’s public fountain.  María approached FUSAI for this loan to bring this much needed vital liquid.

loans.use: to invest in potable water.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.en:
Ruben is 58 years of age; he has been farming for almost 30 years. He is married, and they live peacefully in Antagan. His main activity is planting and harvesting rice on his farm. 

He wishes to avail PHP 25,000 for his farming, so he can buy things like fertilizer and seeds for the next planting season, and to pay the other farm expenses like wages for his fellow farm workers.

According to him, farming is the hardest kind of livelihood, especially when there are occurrences of natural calamities like typhoons, floods, pest attacks, and others that causes poor production.

loans.use: to buy items for his agricultural needs, like fertilizer and seeds for the next planting season, and to pay the other farm expenses like wages of his fellow farm workers.

loans.name: Hosiyatkhon

texts.ru:
Хосиятхон молодая и жизнерадостная женщина. Она родилась в семье преподавателя. Она всегда мечтала получить высшее образование, но так как ее родители не имели достаточно денег, чтобы оплачивать за ее учебу в университете, она не смогла поступить в университет. Хосиятхон вышла замуж. Теперь она должна зарабатывать на жизнь, так как ее муж имеет маленький доход. Так как она не имеет высшего образования, она не может поступить на работу за приличный оклад. Она решила организовать свой бизнес. 
С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес скотоводством, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Hosiyatkhon is a young and cheerful woman. She was born in a family of teachers. She always dreamed of getting a higher education, but since her parents do not have enough money to pay for her tuition she was unable to enroll in a university. Hosiyatkhon got married. Now, she must earn a living since her husband has a small salary. Since she does not have a higher education, she can not get a job for a decent salary. She decided to establish her own business. 

With this aim, she took a course "Bring It On" organized by the Association of Business Women. Now, she is fully able to organize her own business and become successful in this sphere. She wants to establish a livestock business, since she has experience in this kind of work. 

She is requesting a loan of US$3,000 to buy livestock in order to establish a new business.

loans.use: to buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La cliente reside en la zona de Isla en Guayaquil.  Empezó tiempo atrás con la venta de ropa y cosméticos, posteriormente con su esposo emprendieron en la pintada de fachadas de casas y limpieza.  Esta actividad les resulta muy productiva y les agrada muchísimo.  Labora junto con su esposo, todos los días, de 9 am a 4:30 pm.  Es casada y su cónyuge es pintor profesional.  Tiene 2 hijos, quienes asisten a la escuela fiscal del sector.  A futuro, le gustaría disfrutar junto a su familia y que Dios le de salud para seguir adelante progresando.  Ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de materia prima.
texts.en: This client lives in Guayaquil’s Isla zone.  She started some time ago selling clothes and cosmetics and later on she and her husband started painting and cleaning house facades.  This activity is quite profitable and she enjoys it very much.  She works alongside her husband every day from 9am until 4:30pm.  She’s married and her husband’s a professional painter.  She has two children attending the local public school.  In future, she hopes to enjoy her family and that God gives her health to continue making progress.  She needs the loan now to buy raw materials.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Kadiatou

texts.fr:
Né vers 1967 à KOLONDIEBA Ville chef-lieu de la dite commune (3ème Région administrative du Mali), KADIATOU  y réside avec ses 3 enfants et son mari dans une famille nucléaire.
 Mme KADIATOU s’est vite intéressée aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat vente de céréales.  Elle est très sollicitée au marché de Kolondièba et surtout le jour de foire. 
Fort de ses 7 années d’expériences dans le domaine, elle collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  dixième prêt, après avoir remboursé les prêts précédents. 
KADIATOU compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des céréales. Elle s’approvisionne chez les producteurs dans les villages avoisinants. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant et quelques fois à crédit au marché à  des hommes.
KADIATOU espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 110.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en:
Kadiatou was born around 1967 in Kolondieba, the administrative center of the municipality that bears the same name (Mali’s third-largest administrative region), and now lives there with her husband and three children in a nuclear family.
 
Kadiatou quickly became interested in profit-making activities, particularly the purchase and sale of cereals. She is highly sought-after at the market in Kolondièba, particularly on fair days. She has seven years of experience in this field, and is collaborating with Soro Yiriwaso to increase her working capital so that she can meet the demands of her ever-growing customer base. She is on her 10th loan with the institution, having successfully repaid her prior loans.

Kadiatou plans to use her loan to buy cereals. She gets her supplies from farmers in the neighboring villages, and makes her sales on a cash (and sometimes credit) basis to male customers in the market. Kadiatou hopes to make a monthly profit of 110,000 Francs CFA, which she will use to provide for her family, repay her loan, and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy cereals.

loans.name: Jorge Arturo

texts.es: Jorge de 30 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos pequeños hijos. Tiene 6 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Además, compra y vende verduras en el mercado de su localidad. Su principal posesión es su humilde y sencilla casa la cual desea hacerle algunas mejoras. Actualmente, su casa no cuenta con un corredor y cuando llueve el agua se filtra, de igual forma en las tardes el sol molesta y arruina sus pocas pertenencias. Con el fin de solucionar este problema, solicita a FUSAI este crédito para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, ladrillo y cemento de tal forma que le permita construir el corredor de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jorge, 30, lives with his life companion and two small children.  He’s been working in agriculture mainly growing corn and beans six years.  Also, he buys and sells vegetables in the local market.  

His main asset is his humble, simple abode that he wants to make improvements to.  His house currently lacks a front porch and when it rains water leaks in.  In addition, in the afternoon the sun is bothersome and it ruins his few possessions.

To solve this problem, he has asked FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, bricks and cement to build a porch at home.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Erick Stanley

texts.es: Erick de 22 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su sobrina de 7 años. Tiene tres años de trabajar en transporte público como cobrador y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. Habita en condiciones muy humilde y su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su casa. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la introducción de la energía eléctrica en su casa ya que en la actualidad no cuenta con dicho servicio. Con lo que gana en su trabajo pagará la deuda.
texts.en:
Erick, 22, lives with his 7-year-old niece in a house that’s his.  He’s been employed three years as a public transportation fare collector and this is how he supports his home.  He lives under very humble conditions and his dream is to make home improvements.  

He’s decided to ask FUSAI for this loan to install electric power at home since it currently lacks said service.  He will repay the loan with earnings from work.

loans.use: to install electricity at home.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
Hilda is a 40-year-old married woman, and a mother of three children from Trinidad, Bohol. She earns a living through her retail sales of food and medicinal supplements to the people in her area. 

Hilda is asking for a loan of 7,000 PHP to buy a stock of food supplements. With this, she will be able to acquire more stock to sell to her customers in her neighborhood. 

In the future, Hilda hopes to make her business a success and a stable source of income.

loans.use: to buy more stock of food supplements

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy potato seeds

loans.name: Leonor

texts.en:
Leonor works hard to support her family; she is married, and has a business in direct selling personal collections and Natasha products in the Philippines. She has been in this business for seven years.

Leonor requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of personal collections and Natasha products to sell.

In the future, Leonor would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of personal collection and Natasha products to sell

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael de 33 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su compañera de vida y sus hijos de 10 años, 5 años y 3 años de edad.  Rafael trabaja como mecánico y pintor en un taller de su localidad, en el cual lleva 10 años de ser empleado. De esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar y junto a su esposa  van sacando adelante a su familia. Desea reparar el muro perimetral de su casa ya que actualmente es de lámina y no es muy seguro, además ya está deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena de tal forma que pueda darle mayor seguridad a su familia y sus pocas pertenencias.
texts.en:
Rafael, 33, lives in his own house with his life partner and their children who are ages 10, 5, and 3. Rafael has been working as a mechanic and painter for 10 years in a workshop in his town. In this way, he provides for his home and he and his wife together are getting their family ahead. 

Rafael is hoping to repair the wall around his house since it is currently made of metal sheets and isn’t very secure. It is also deteriorating. Because of this, he is requesting this loan from Fusai to invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, and sand so he can give his family and their few possessions more security.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand to construct a wall around his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sigar, rice, beans, oil and beverages for his store and to prepare food to sell.

loans.name: Nuria Judith

texts.es: Nuria de 19 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto a su familia. Es una joven caracterizada por ser muy trabajadora, emprendedora y responsable. Ella se gana la vida vendiendo ropa para bebe y adultos. El negocio lo tiene dentro de su casa de habitación, en donde también vende golosinas y refrescos. Actualmente, el techo de su casa se encuentra en malas condiciones ya que el sol y las lluvias lo han enmohecido y se ha picado lo cual no logra retener el agua cuando llueve. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de  tres docenas de lámina galvanizada que le permita hacer la reparación del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Nuria, 19, lives with her family in a house of her own.  This young woman is noted for being very hardworking, enterprising and responsible.  She earns her living selling clothes for infants and adults.  Her business is home-based and she also sells snacks and soft-drinks there.

The roof is currently in bad condition because the sun and the rains have rusted it so that it no longer keeps water out when it rains.  This is the reason why she’s asked FUSAI for this loan to buy three dozen galvanized metal sheets that will make it possible for her to repair the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair her roof.

loans.name: Dina Elizabeth

texts.es: Dina tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar desde hace 7 años. Dina se dedica a la compra y venta de granos básicos tales como: maíz, frijol y maicillo. De esta forma colabora en la economía del hogar. Con el fin de brindar mejores condiciones a su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera ya que el techo se encuentra dañado por causa del viento, el sol y las lluvias. Espera contar con este apoyo y hacer los cambios lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Dina is 35 years old and has been living in her own house with her family for the past 7 years.  Dina makes her living buying and selling staple foods such as:  corn, beans and sorghum.  In this way, she contributes to the household finances.

With the goal of providing her family with better living conditions, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheets and wood, since her roof is damaged because of the wind, sun and rains.  She hopes to get this support to make the changes as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets and wood to renovate the roof of her house.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel de 54 años de edad, es casado y habita junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 13 y 15 años de edad. Su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y él presta servicios como ordenanza desde hace dos años. Su casa es muy humilde pero está muy contento porque es propia y tiene plena confianza que poco a poco logrará ir mejorando sus condiciones. Desea construir una pila para el almacenamiento del agua ya que por el momento no tiene un lugar adecuado para reguardar el vital líquido. Solícita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y ladrillo para hacer lo antes posible la pila que tanto desea.
texts.en: Fidel is 54 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and their two children, who are thirteen and fifteen years old. His wife is a homemaker and he has been providing services as an assistant for two years. His home is very humble but he is very happy because he owns it and is absolutely confident that he will be able to improve its condition little by little. He wants to build a water storage tank because for now he doesn't have a proper place to keep this precious liquid. He is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, and brick in order to build the tank he needs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and bricks to build a water tank.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: José es un hombre de 57 años de edad quien tiene mucha energía para trabajar y luchar por mejores condiciones. Habita en casa propia junto con su hermana quien depende de él. José se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada tanto para caballero como para dama. Habita en condiciones muy humildes y con el fin de mejorarlas ha  tomado la decisión de cambiar las paredes de su casa ya que en la actualidad son de lámina y están dañadas. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena y cemento para construir pared de su casa.
texts.en: José, 57, has much energy for work and to strive for better conditions.  He lives in his own house with his sister who depends on him.  José works selling new and used men’s and women’s clothes.  He lives in very humble conditions and aiming at improving them has decided to replace the walls in the house that are currently metal sheets and are damaged.  He’s asking FUSAI for this loan to buy bricks, sand and cement to build walls at home.

loans.use: to buy supplies to build a wall.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Luis tiene 18 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su madre. Trabaja como motorista de transporte escolar y es así como colabora con la economía de su hogar. Junto a su madre buscan las formas y oportunidades de salir adelante. Desea terminar las  mejoras de su casa y para ello solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en construcción de un muro perimetral  para lo cual necesita comprar los materiales necesarios (arena, cemento y ladrillo) y para introducción de luz eléctrica ya que no cuenta con dicho servicio.
texts.en: Luis, 18, lives with his mother in a house he owns.  He works as a school bus driver and contributes to household economy this way.  He and his mother seek ways and opportunities to move ahead.  He wants to finish home improvements and this is why he’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy building supplies like sand, cement and bricks to erect a wall around his house and also to install electric power which the house currently lacks.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to build a wall and to bring electric power to his house.

loans.name: Cruz Dolores

texts.es: Cruz de 32 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de  8 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace algunos años y es así como se gana la vida y colabora con la economía de su hogar.  Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para terminar de comprar los materiales necesarios (arena, cemento, hierro y ladrillo) para terminar de construir un pequeño cuarto dentro de su propiedad. Espera contar con este apoyo ya que con las lluvias las paredes se le están dañando.
texts.en:
Cruz, 32 years old, lives in her own house with her life partner and her young, 8-year old son.  She has spent her time offering domestic services for some years now, and that is how she makes her living and contributes to household finances.

She is applying for this loan from FUSAI to finish buying the necessary materials (sand, cement, iron and bricks) to finish building a small room within her property.  She hopes to get this support, because the walls are getting damaged with the rain.

loans.use: to buy:  sand, cement, iron and bricks to build a room.

loans.name: Don De Dieu Group

texts.fr: DON DE DIEU est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Lucienne (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 41 ans. Lucienne n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Lucienne est mariée à un certain Bertin. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à sa charge. Lucienne vit avec ses enfants. Les charges de ménage sont supportées par Lucienne et son mari. Pour ce faire, Lucienne vend des bois de chauffages et du soja de façon ambulante depuis cinq ans. Lucienne s'approvisionne dans sa région. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Lucienne s’associe aux autres membres du groupe DON DE DIEU pour solliciter un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Don de Dieu ["God's gift] is a group composed of three members living in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, Lucienne (the one raising her hand in the photo) is 41 years old. Lucienne did not attend school. Her husband's name is Bertin. They have three dependent children, all in school. Lucienne lives together with her children. Lucienne and her husband jointly provide for household needs. In order to do so, Lucienne sells firewood and soya as a street vendor. She stocks up in her region. With the goal of bolstering her business, Lucienne, jointly with the other members of the Don de Dieu group, is seeking a third loan from ALIDe. Their prior loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: Acheter des bois de chauffage et du soja.

loans.name: Saimir

texts.en:
This is Saimir, who is 36 years old.  He is a bar-restaurant owner who learned culinary skills in Greece and worked in Greece and Kosovo prior to opening his own place five years ago, in his hometown. He immigrated to Greece with his parents when he was a teenager and came back when he turned 31. 

Here is what he said to the loan officer: “I loved living in Greece and learning so much in every aspect of life. Greece made me a decent person and I am so glad that I had such an opportunity. Sometimes I feel more Greek than Albanian and it might sound odd but it’s true.”

Saimir’s restaurant is preferred by many locals due to his good cooked foods and his personable nature.  He wants this loan to stock up on inventory items.

loans.use: to stock up on inventory items for his bar-restaurant

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair the roof.

loans.name: Atabek

texts.ru:
Атабеку 50 лет. Он живет с женой и детьми в районе Гиссар и работает пекарем по выпечке традиционных лепешек. Выпекаются лепешки в маленьком помещении, состоящей из национальной шарообразной печи и огромного стола для раскатывания теста. Атабек около 4 года работает в этой сфере деятельности. Работа пекаря требует к себе максимального внимания и Атабек все свое внимание посвящает работе.
   Скоро в Таджикистане начнутся праздники, и главным украшением для национального стола являются таджикские лепешки. Атабек собирается закупить больше муки и дров, чтобы выпечь достаточное количество лепешек для предстоящих праздников. Для приобретения муки и дров он просит кредит, чтобы у жителей его района были на праздничном столе горячие лепешки.
texts.en: Atabek is 50 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the Gissar region and works as a baker. He specializes in traditional flatbreads. He bakes his breads in a small space, where there is a traditional round oven and an oversized table for rolling the dough. Atabek has been in this line of business for four years. Baking is a trade demanding a lot of focus, and Atabek concentrates all his efforts on work. Soon a holiday period will start in Tajikistan, and  a traditional meal is always enhanced by Tajik flatbreads. Atabek plans to stock up on flour and firewood in order to bake a sufficient quantity of flatbreads for the upcoming holidays. He is requesting a loan to buy flour and firewood so that to provide locals with fresh flatbreads for their festive meals.

loans.use: to buy flour and firewood.

loans.name: Douglas Ines

texts.es: Douglas de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre, hermanos y hermana. Tiene cuatro años de trabajar como empleado en una zapatería. Esta es su principal fuente de ingresos y de esta forma colabora con la economía de su hogar. Habita en condiciones muy humildes, su casa es de bahareque y madera, su deseo es construir un cuarto para lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, lámina, vara de castilla, etc. Espera poder contar con el apoyo y hacer su cuarto lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Douglas, 25, lives with his mother, brothers and sister in a house of their own.  He’s been employed in a shoe shop four years.  This is his main source of income and how he contributes to household economy.

He lives in very humble conditions.  His house is wattle and daub and wood and he wants to build a room which is why he’s asked FUSAI for a loan to buy lumber, metal sheets, iron rods, etc.  He’s hoping to be able to count on this support to build the room as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to add a room at home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement and sand to plaster the walls of her home and cement the floor.

loans.name: Miguel Enrique

texts.es: Miguel tiene 25 años de edad y habita en  casa familiar junto a sus padres. Es un hombre muy trabajador ya que desde muy joven sus padres le enseñaron el trabajo de la agricultura y es así como desde hace 10 años trabaja la tierra principalmente en el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Desea mejorar las condiciones de la cocina de su casa ya que como se muestra en la fotografía las paredes y el techo están deteriorados por lo que solita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos de tal forma que pueda mejorar las condiciones de la cocina.
texts.en:
Miguel is 25 years old and lives in his family home with his parents.  He is a very hardworking man, because from a young age, his parents taught him how to work in agriculture.  This is how, for the past 10 years, he has worked the land, primarily growing corn and beans.

He would like to improve the condition of the kitchen in his house, because, as the photo shows, the walls and the roof have deteriorated.  That is why he is applying for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheets, wood and nails, so that he can improve the condition of the kitchen.

loans.use: to buy:  galvanized metal sheets, wood and nails to repair the kitchen.

loans.name: Nazmije

texts.en:
This is Nazmije, the 49-year-old married mother of four children, being photographed inside her little one-room family house. 

She is a villager living in south-central Albania who is applying for a loan for the first time. She will use it on medical expenses for herself. 

Kindly note that she is on disability; yet, she still works and has been running her agricultural activity for 20 years. People in the village spoke very highly of her and made the best comments about her to the loan officer. 

“Being sick or not sick we must work," Nazmijee said. "There is work for everyone should they have the desire to do so. I enjoy working and I wake up very early in the mornings; planting; preparing the soil, watering and harvesting the veggies and also look after the animals and milking them, etc. Then I take the fresh produce to the city to sell. This is my daily routine, 7 days a week."

loans.use: to pay her medical expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building supplies to build a room.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.es: Julieta, habita en Managua y es una mujer de 51 años de edad, quien enviudó hace algunos años atrás, ella a pesar de los acontecimientos se propuso superarse profesionalmente, no situando de impedimento su edad y apoyo económico de su esposo. Actualmente trabaja por su propia cuenta en el diseño y elaboración de joyas de plata y fantasía, con lo que paga sus estudios en una universidad. Julieta se encuentra en el último periodo de su carrera de Licenciatura en Psicología, pero tiene dificultad para pagar sus gastos de titulación, solicita su crédito para tal fin, confiando que con la culminación de su carrera pueda combinar su nueva profesión con el diseño de sus productos.
texts.en:
Julieta is 51 years old and lives in Managua. She was widowed some years ago. Despite this event, she decided to obtain new professional skills, instead of seeing her age and lack of spousal financial support as an impediment. 

Julieta is currently self-employed, and she works designing and crafting silver jewellery and costume jewellery. This is how she pays her university tuition. 

Julieta is currently in the last phase of her psychology degree, but she is having difficulty paying for her graduation fees. She is requesting a loan for this reason. She is confident that, once she graduates, she will be able to combine her new profession with her current jewellery design business.

loans.use: to pay her graduation fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, rods, and bamboo to build a room.

loans.name: Synia Yanira

texts.es:
Synia, sabe que para aprovechar la época de siembra es necesario tener todo listo con tiempo para evitar alguna dificultad, por lo que opta por otro crédito que le faciliten la compra de insumo agrícola (insecticida, herbicidas y abono). Anteriormente invirtió en la misma actividad económica dándole los ingresos necesarios para pagar la deuda y mejorar su economía.
Synia está dándole a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, todos están bien de salud y se mantiene el mismo grupo familiar.
texts.en: Synia knows that in order to take advantage of the planting season it’s necessary to have everything ready on time to avoid any difficulty.  This is why she’s opted for another loan that will make buying agricultural supplies (insecticide, herbicide and manure) easier.  Previously, she invested in the same economic activity earning enough income to repay the loan and to improve her economy.  Synia’s giving her family better living conditions; they are all in good health and her immediate family is the same.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Halit

texts.en: Halit is back, requesting your help again. This time, he would like a loan to build a fence around his agricultural field.

loans.use: To build a fence around his agricultural field

loans.name: Enalba

texts.es: A sus 41 años de edad y 16 de experiencia como estilista, la sala de belleza de Enalba, además de ofrecer servicios de imagen personal y profesional,  vende mercancía asociada a los servicios que ofrece,  y esto es,  porque cuando joven, adquirió experiencia en este negocio, debido a que fue empleada de uno igual. Enalba hoy,  trabaja desde las 9 de la mañana, hasta las 8 de la noche, día a día, con el fin de generar ingresos, para fortalecer la gestión de su hogar, conformado por su cónyuge y sus dos hijos, en las edades de 6 y 14 años. Sus ventas las realizan de contado, desde el punto de servicios  y así mismo compra a crédito y de contado, en laboratorios que le ofrecen buenos precios. Sus principales clientes son, vecinos, familiares, amigos, y referidos que conocen sus servicios y se sienten muy satisfechos. La meta  de Enalba, mas adelante es ampliar su negocio y convertirlo en una sala de spa, pues sueña con tener su propia vivienda, y ello requiere mucho esfuerzo y dedicación;  su mayor desafío es la inestabilidad en los trabajos que afecta a su esposo actualmente. Ella está empeñada en aumentar sus ingresos, por eso acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará productos capilares, una camilla, lava cabezas, sillas para completar su spa y empezar a abonarle a su sueño de prosperidad, lo cual hará de su credikiva una inversión exitosa en el futuro. .
texts.en:
At the age of 41 and with 16 years’ experience as a hair stylist, Enalba’s beauty salon in addition to offering personal and professional image services, also sells merchandise associated with the services rendered there.  This is because when she was young she acquired experience in this business because she was employed in a similar one.

Today, Enalba works from 9 in the morning until 8 at night day to day aiming at generating income to strengthen her home consisting of her spouse and two children aged 6 and 14.

Her sales are cash and credit with respect to the services and she also makes her purchases for cash and on credit in laboratories that offer the best prices.  Her main customers are neighbors, family members, friends and referrals who know about her services and feel very satisfied.

Enalba’s goal is to expand the business and turn it into a full spa for she dreams with owning a house and to do so much effort and dedication are required.  Her greatest challenge is her husband’s current employment instability.

She’s determined to increase her income which is why she’s calling on a Kiva loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy more hair products, a cot, a hair washing basin and chairs to complete her spa and start making contributions to her dream of prosperity which will make her Kiva loan successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy supplies and equipment for her beauty supply.

loans.name: Dile

texts.en: Dile replaced the stolen milk cow thanks to your help. Now she is requesting your help again, this time requesting a loan to build a stable.

loans.use: To repair the cow stable

loans.name: Mare

texts.en:
Mare is a 53-year-old villager and a mother of seven school-aged children, six girls and a boy. Pictured is her goat herd. She started goat-keeping about four years ago, and she has loved it. “Where I come from, the Alps of Albania, almost everyone operates such an activity. It suits the geographical landscape. The difference, though, is in the milk and the homemade cheese because the taste is different,” said Mare. 

Mare lived in the Alps before coming down to the current district. She is very happy with the progress of her activity. “It has grown and the demand is growing too,” she said. Mare sells homemade cheese to locals upon prior requests and also sells baby goats. When the babies are born she doesn’t milk the goats for four months because babies can grow very healthy this way, according to Mare.

Mare wants to buy more goats with this loan.

loans.use: to add more goats to the herd

loans.name: Khusravbek

texts.ru: Хусравбек живет с женой и двумя сыновьями в районе Б.Гафурова города Худжанд. Ему 34 года. Он работает мастером по ремонту холодильников. Таким видом деятельности он занимается более 5 лет. Хусравбек ремонтирует все виды холодильников, в том числе домашние, магазинные и промышленные. Город Худжанд с каждым днем развивается, открываются новые магазины и промышленности. Привозят новую технику и холодильники. До этого времени Хусравбек работал в ручную, и теперь он хочет расширить свою деятельность и приобрести аппарат по починке холодильника, с помощью которого его работа облегчится и ускорится. Для реализации задуманного Хусравбек обратился за кредитом.
texts.en:
Khusravbek lives with his wife and two sons in the B.Gafurova district of the city of Khujand. He is 34 years old. 

He works as a master repairman for refrigerators. He has been involved in this kind of work for more than five years. Khusravbek repairs all types of refrigerators, whether domestic, store or industrial. The city of Khujand is developing day by day, opening new stores and industries. They bring new machinery and refrigerators. 

Up til now, Khusravbek has worked by hand, and now he wants to expand his activities and purchase an apparatus for repairing refrigerators, with the help of which his work will be easier and faster. 

In order to realize his plans, Khusravbek applied for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase an apparatus for repairing refrigerators

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es:
La señora Martha  es una persona  muy  emprendedora vive con  sus   hijos en un caserío  al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la pulpería desde hace más de 12  años. 
Doña Martha el préstamo lo necesita para la compra  de maíz, frijoles, café, manteca, pan, arroz, azúcar,  etc. Con el crédito espera  el aumento de sus ventas debido a que contara con más capital fresco y  con producto que ofrecer a los clientes que visitan.
Doña Martha  espera que mejore su situación económica en el hogar y que se vea reflejado con esta inversión. En unos años, espera  que su negocio  este posicionado como la  tienda más grande y  conocido de la zona y poder seguir apoyando a  su familia.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Septiembre  del 2013
texts.en:
Martha’s a very enterprising person living with her children in a settlement in southern Honduras.  Her business for the last 12 years has been a grocery store.

Martha needs the loan to buy corn, beans, coffee, shortening, bread, rice, sugar, etc.  She will increase sales with the loan because she’ll have more fresh capital and products to offer to customers that visit her.

She hopes her economic situation at home will improve thanks to this investment.  In a few years, she hopes her business will be positioned as the largest, best-known store in the zone to be able to continue supporting her family.



Choluteca, Honduras – September, 2013

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Ryzhdi

texts.en:
Ryzhdi wants to buy a dairy cow with this loan, and he will be very appreciative to all Kiva lenders for their financial help. So far his livestock activity of about 20 years has included only goats, but now he wants to add some dairy cows. 

“I am growing older and goats need someone who is younger and faster because they run very fast, and in just five minutes you see them up on the mountain. I find myself now not strong enough to run after them,” says Ryzhdi.
 
Ryzhdi is a father of five children and lives in the south-central part of Albania.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Eduart

texts.en:
Eduart is back again, requesting a small loan to stock up on inventory items. 

Sometimes, it is difficult for grocery store owners, who run small neighborhood stores in Albania, to save money for stocking up on items. Sometimes, people buy on a list, whenever they will have the money and, unfortunately, sometimes they do not pay at all. You can't force them to pay because you are aware of their financial situation.

loans.use: to stock up on inventory items for his small grocery store in his village.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Luis, un campesino de 67 años de edad, se ha dedicado desde su juventud a realizar todas las labores del campo, actividad que aprendió de sus padres. Luego de casarse comenzó a criar animales y a cultivar en diferentes tierras de sus familiares, donde adquirió experiencia para comenzar con su negocio propio de cultivos y ganado lechero, cuyas producciones son comercializadas en el mercado del municipio donde reside y, de esta manera genera los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento a su familia, conformada por su esposa y 3 hijos. El empuje, la tenacidad y el empeño con el que realiza sus labores le han permitido salir adelante, aún cuando las dificultades económicas parecen no terminar. El cliente actualmente solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas) y concentrado alimentar a sus animales, de esta forma podrá continuar con su labor y tendrá la posibilidad de sacar una cosecha más productiva y aumentar la producción de la leche, con lo que se incrementarán también los ingresos que recibe por las ventas realizadas. Luis sueña con fortalecer cada vez más su negocio y así poder garantizar a su familia una estabilidad económica favorable para disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis, 67, worked in agriculture since he was a youth doing all kinds of field chores, activities he learned from his parents.  After getting married he started raising animals and cultivating land belonging to various family members acquiring experience to start a business of his own growing crops and raising dairy cattle.  He sells his production in the local market in the town where he lives and generates enough income this way to support his family consisting of his wife and three children.  The drive, tenacity and effort he puts into his work have made it possible for him to get ahead even when economic difficulties seem unending.

He’s currently asking for a loan to buy agricultural supplies (manure, fertilizer, pesticide) and feed concentrate for his animals to continue with his work and be able to yield a more productive harvest and to increase milk production that will lead to increased income from sales too.  Luis dreams with strengthening his business more every day to ensure favorable economic stability for his family so they can enjoy better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Pashke

texts.en:
Pashke has three children. Until 1997, she and her family lived in the most rural northern part of the country but when her house burned to the ground during the civil war she moved to her current location where she operates a clothing store, which she has been doing for seven years. She earns a living but is the only person supporting her family. 

Pashke is requesting a loan, which she will use to add more inventory items to sell.

loans.use: to purchase inventory items

loans.name: Bakhtiyot

texts.ru:
Бахтиёру 36 лет. Он женатый мужчина. Его жена работает в швейном цехе. Два сына учатся в школе, дочка еще маленькая для школы. Бахтиёр с семьей живут в городе Худжанде. На данный момент он безработный.
    В течение нескольких лет Бахтиёр жил в России и работал водителем микроавтобуса. Он возил русских горожан с одной точки города до другой. Бахтиёр не найдя работу в своем городе был вынужден на время оставить жену и детей чтобы прокормить их. Недавно он вернулся на Родину. И теперь хочет приобрести микроавтобус марки "Газель" для 16 пассажиров. Для такого закупа у Бахтиёра недостаточно средств. Поэтому он просит кредит. 
   Когда у Бахтиёра будет свой микроавтобус, он сможет работать в своем городе и ему больше не придется снова оставить свою семью. Он очень надеется на поддержку.
texts.en:
Bakhtiyot is 36 years old. He is a married man. His wife works in a sewing studio. His two sons go to school, and his daughter is still small for school. Bakhtiyot lives with his family in the city of Khujand. At the moment, he is unemployed.

For several years, Bakhtiyot lived in Russia and worked as a minibus driver. He drove Russian citizens from one point in the city to another. Bakhtiyot did not find work in his own city and was compelled to leave his wife and children in order to feed them. He recently returned to his homeland. And now wants to purchase a Gazelle minibus for 16 passengers. Bakhtiyot does not have sufficient funds for such a purchase. Therefore, he is requesting a loan. 

When Bakhtiyot has his own minibus, he will be able to work in his own city and will no longer have to leave his family. He has high hopes for support.

loans.use: to buy a Gazelle minibus in order to start earning a living

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Doña Isabel tiene una edad de 51 años ella es casada y madre de 6 hijos de los cuales 3 dependen de ella 2 de ellos están cursando la carrera de educación comercial y el menor está en primaria y los 3 mayores viven en hogares aparte. Ella es ama de casa y agricultora desde hace más de 3 años ya que en compañía de su esposo practican la agricultura la cual es medio de sustento para su familia y lo ha sido por generaciones. La tierra que en compañía de su esposo cultivan es propia la cual fue adquirida por medio de una compra gracias a las ganancias en las cosechas anteriores de café las cuales han sido de gran ayuda. Gracias al cultivo de café ellos han podido saciar las necesidades de su hijos como la alimentación, vestimenta, medicinas con algunas restricciones y los estudios de sus hijos que hasta hoy en día sigue siendo medio de sustento para su familia.
Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita un financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL con lo que podrá dar asistencia a sus cultivos de café como la limpieza, la compra de insumos para la aplicación de los mismos como el abono, fertilizantes, foliares, entre otros que hacen de sus cultivos más atractivos para sus clientes.         
Como todo productor de café ella para el futuro planea poder mejorar el rendimiento en sus cultivos de café en cuanto a producción y calidad mediante la ampliación dela misma. Su sueño es poder dar a sus hijos la calidad de educación necesaria para que ellos puedan salir adelante con sus negocios sus empresas, sus familias y todo aquel ambiente que ellos puedan fortalecer con educación y humildad.
texts.en:
Isabel, 51, is married and mother of six children three of which still depend on her.  Two of them are studying commercial education and the youngest is in primary school; the three oldest live in homes of their own.  She’s a housewife and for more than three years has been farming since she and her husband work in agriculture which has been their means of family support for generations.

The land she and her husband work is theirs; they purchased it thanks to profits from previous coffee harvests which have been of great use to them.  Thanks to coffee growing they’ve been able to meet their children’s food, dress and with some restrictions their medicine needs.  To date, it continues to be the means to pay their children’s schooling costs.

At present, she’s asking Comixmul cooperative for a loan to provide coffee crop maintenance like weeding and to buy supplies like manure, fertilizer, leaf fertilizer and others that will be applied to help make her crops more attractive to her customers.

Like all coffee growers, she plans in future to be able to improve coffee crop yields with respect to production and quality by means of expansion.  Her dream is to be able to provide her children with the education necessary for them to get ahead with their businesses and their firms strengthening their families and all environments that can be so strengthened with education and humility.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and to weed her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Lindita

texts.en:
Lindita is a 37-year-old married mother of four children who are 16, 14, 10 and 8 years old. She works in a fish factory in northern Albania and also has been running her own livestock activity for the past eight years. Lindita has requested this loan to buy a dairy cow and a calf.

The photo shows Lindita in front of the type of shed that every farmhouse has. Farmers store almost anything in such sheds from tools to agricultural produce that they use during winter times. 

Kindly note that our organization recently expanded to this new area where there are 23 villages that we are glad to serve.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and a calf

loans.name: Mohzoda

texts.ru: Мохзода уже второй раз обращается за кредитом для развития торговли. Еще в начале своего бизнеса она продавала семечки потому что у нее не было денег для закупа  другого товара для перепродажи. Год за годом она начала расширяться и уже одновременно продавала хозяйственные товары. Мохзода занята в сфере торговли более 20 лет. У нее хороший опыт в этой сфере. Сейчас Мохзода готовится к зиме и хочет пополнить запасы своего товара. Мохзода собирается привести световыделяющие товары, батарейки и другие необходимые хозяйственные товары. Потому что зимой в Истаравшане электричество подают лимитом.
texts.en:
Mohzoda, for the second time, is applying for a loan for developing trade. When she started her business, she sold seeds because she did not have money to purchase other goods for resale. Year after year, she started to expand and simultaneously sold household goods. 

Mohzoda has been involved in the sphere of trade for more than 20 years. She has good experience in this area. Now, Mohzoda is preparing for the winter and wants to replenish her goods. Mohzoda intends to offer lighting products, batteries, and other necessary household goods, because in winter in Istaravshan electricity is offered in limited supply.

loans.use: to purchase household goods for developing trade

loans.name: Klodian

texts.en: The recipient of a previous loan, Klodian is back needing your help again to stock up on second-hand inventory items to resell. He wants to thank every lender for helping him previously.

loans.use: To buy second-hand clothes and electrical kitchen ware to sell.

loans.name: Antoneta

texts.en:
Antoneta is 26 years old, married, and has one child. She operates a pastry/bakery shop, which she has been doing for four years, in a little town in northern Albania where the tomb of the national hero Skanderbeg is located. The town is frequented by foreign visitors all seasons who visit the museum and Antoneta’s shop is busy. There are only a few shops of this kind in the town and Antoneta's shop is almost next to the tomb and visible.

Antoneta is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy inventory items for her shop.

loans.use: to buy inventory items for her pastry/bakery shop

loans.name: Jenny Margoth

texts.es:
Doña Jenny Margoth tiene un grado de educación secundario completo por lo que al terminar sus estudio ella pudo graduarse como maestra de educación, ella es casada y madre de 2 hijos los cuales cursan la secundaria en diferentes grados de educación. Junto a su esposo al salir de sus actividades escolares se dirige hacia el campo para ejercer su segundo trabajo la agricultura que gracias al esfuerzo y la buena administración han podido sacra su negocio adelante y poder de las ganancias proveer una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos dándoles la oportunidad de estudiar y de que ellos en un futuro se preparen a nivel universitario. La tierra que en compañía de su esposo trabajan es propia y agradecen a DIOS por la oportunidad de haberles brindado este logro más en su vida para generar ingresos y enriquecer el patrimonio para sus hijos. Sus clientes son las bodegas, vecinos e intermediarios que llegan a la zona para la adquisición del producto al final de cada cosecha. 
Ella ha solicitado un financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de 10 QQ de formula cafetalera, 12 QQ de urea y 12 QQ de fertilizante con lo que podrá aplicar a sus cultivos y protegerlos de plagas y bichos que deterioran este producto.
Los planes a futuro son los de ampliar más sus cultivos de café por medio de la siembra, mejorando y sembrando una variedad diferente del producto como también satisfaciendo algunas necesidades en sus clientes como la demanda que actualmente maneja para dar un mejor servicio y darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y educación.
texts.en:
Jenny Margoth completed her secondary education.  When she finished her studies, she was able to graduate as a teacher.  She is married and has two children, who are in different grades in high school.  Upon leaving her school activities, she heads out to the field with her husband to exercise her second job, agriculture.  

Thanks to effort and good administration, they have been able to get their business ahead.  With the profits, they have been able to provide their children with a better quality of life.  They have given them the opportunity to go to school and to prepare for the university in the future.  

The land that she works with her husband is their own.  They are grateful to God for the opportunity of having provided another achievement in her life to generate income and enrich her children’s inheritance.

Their customers are the grocery stores, neighbors, and intermediaries that come to the area to get the product at the end of each harvest.

She has requested a loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative to buy 1,000 pounds of coffee formula, 1,200 pounds of urea, and 1,200 pounds of fertilizer.  She will use these on her crops and protect them from pests and insects that destroy this product.

The plans for the future are to expand her coffee crops by improving the planting and planting a variety of different products.  She will also satisfy some customer needs such as the demand that she currently manages.  She will do this in order to provide better service and to give her children a better quality of life and an education.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Donero

texts.en:
Donero is requesting a loan of 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) from lenders. He will purchase agricultural supplies like fertilizers, rice seeds, and pesticides. He will also use part of the loan to pay for the labor cost spent in farming and snacks or food for his helpers in the farm labor. 

Donero is 46 years old, is married, and has six children. He lives in the village of Antagan with his family. According to him, its not easy to have six children, especially when they are all attending school, for a farmer like him. His wife used to budget their daily immediate needs and allowances of their children. Truly, his income in farming is not enough. He hopes that with this financial assistance, he will keep improving his rice crop production.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies like fertilizers, rice seeds, and pesticides, and to pay the labor costs of farming and snacks or food for his helpers in the farm labor.

loans.name: Benkola Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe   BENKOLA   sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  35 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KOLONDIEBA, une des Sous-préfecture de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.
Mme  KOROTOUMOU (1ère à droite sur la photo) compte acheter avec son prêt des sacs de maïs pour ensuite les revendre au marché et en famille. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 9.000FCFA.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkola Group are all married women with an average age of 35 years and an average of 5 children.  They all live in polygamous families in Kolondieba, one of the sub-prefectures in the third administrative region of Mali.  

The women work with the field Partner, Soro Yiriwaso in order to run their businesses.  This will be their fifth loan with this organisation and they intend to repay it promptly.  Madame Korotoumou (on the far right of the photo) intends to buy sacks of maize with her loan.  She will then resell the maize at the market and within her family.  She expects to earn a monthly average of 9,000 francs CFA.  Madame Korotoumou will use her earnings to repay her loan and help her husband with the day-to-day expenses of their household.

loans.use: to buy maize.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Durán.  Empezó tiempo atrás, cuando junto con su esposo y el dinero que él recibió de su jubilación, decidieron montar el negocio de cyber y cabinas.  Desde entonces, se han mantenido y progresado de a poco.  Trabaja todos los días, con la ayuda de su hijo, en el horario de 8 am a 10 pm.  Es casada y su esposo es jubilado de la policía nacional.  Tiene un hijo que estudia en el colegio fiscal del sector donde habitan.  Le gustaría a futuro poder ampliar su local de cyber para tener más computadoras.  Ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de cuadernos y útiles para su hijo.
texts.en:
The client is from the city of Durán.  She started some time ago when, together with her husband, they decided to set up a cyber café and phone booth business with the money he received from his retirement.  Ever since then, they have maintained and progressed little by little.

She works every day with the help of her son.  Her schedule is from 8:00 a.m. until 10:00 p.m.  She is married, and her husband is retired from the national police.  She has a son who goes to public school in the area where they live.

In the future she would like to be able to expand her cyber café in order to have more computers.  She now needs the loan to buy notebooks and supplies for her son.

loans.use: to buy notebooks and supplies for her son.

loans.name: Betty Dionila

texts.es: La cliente reside en la ciudad de Durán.  Se dedicó a la venta de comidas que ha sido un negocio familiar por mucho tiempo.  Trabaja todos los días junto con su esposo, de 5 am a 1 pm.
